meanings.definition: Unable to be described or expressed in words.
meanings.sent1: The beauty of the sunset was truly indescribable.
meanings.sent2: The joy she felt upon receiving the surprise gift was indescribable.
meanings.sent3: Trying to explain the taste of the exotic fruit was an indescribable challenge.
meanings.sent4: The feeling of freedom while flying a kite was as indescribable as soaring through the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the orchestra playing was so indescribable that it brought tears to her eyes.

meanings.sent1: The magic trick left the audience in an indescribable state of wonder.
meanings.sent2: The view from the mountaintop was truly indescribable.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to fix the broken vase ended in an indescribable mess.
meanings.sent4: The bond between the two friends was as indescribable as the colors of a rainbow.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the chef's special dish was so indescribable that it left everyone speechless.
